name: STIBBrusselsTravelInformation
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brussels travel information
des:
Brussels Travel Information is your go-to Alexa skill for real-time updates on public transportation in the STIB network. This skill is exclusively designed for people in Brussels, Belgium who want to know real-time arrival information about buses, trams, and metro services. Currently, other networks are not supported, but we are working on adding support for additional travel providers soon.

Features:
Find estimated arrival times for buses, trams, and metro on the STIB network.
Automatically detects your nearest stop based on your location.
Easy to use: just ask Alexa about your specific line and arrival times.

Limitations:
This skill only supports the STIB network in Brussels, Belgium.
Due to some issues, arrival times for some stops may be unavailable. This is a temporary issue and will be resolved in an upcoming update.
Start planning your journeys seamlessly with Brussels Travel Information!
